elements.text: You walk your dog in the park everyday. You and your dog have both started to notice that you're less steady when you walk. You begin to think about other small changes you've noticed recently, and you think that your disease is...

elements.name: Unsteadiness in the Park_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
